title: Tottenham Hotspur v Manchester United: Premier League – live
summary: Ruben Amorim's team aims to continue their unbeaten streak as they face Tottenham Hotspur. Tim de Lisle provides minute-by-minute updates on the match. Fans are eager to see if Amorim's side can maintain their impressive form.

title: Arsenal 1-1 Chelsea: Women’s Super League – live
summary: The league leaders are set to face off against the European champions in an exciting matchup. Rob Smyth provides minute-by-minute updates on the game's progress. Fans can stay tuned for live commentary and key moments from the match.

title: Everton v Fulham, West Ham v Burnley, and more: football clockwatch – live
summary: Barry Glendenning will provide live updates starting at 3pm GMT for the Premier League matches and other events. Fans can expect timely information on the game's progress and key moments. Stay tuned for comprehensive coverage of today's football action.

title: ‘The fear is real’: how Midlands attacks have changed Sikh women’s daily lives
summary: Many women are expressing fear about going out alone following a series of religiously motivated rapes and assaults. This climate of intimidation has raised concerns over personal safety and the impact on women's freedom. The incidents have sparked discussions about the need for stronger measures to protect vulnerable individuals.

title: Scotland v New Zealand: Autumn Nations Series rugby union – live
summary: The All Blacks are set to play at Murrayfield, with Lee Calvert providing live minute-by-minute updates. Fans can expect detailed commentary on the game's progress. Stay tuned for insights and key moments from the match.
